full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI MTHA' DPYOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @046B (ZHES 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI MTHA' DPYOD BSDUS PA 'DI NI SKU 'BUM GYI RGYUD PA CHOS RJES CHOS PHUN TSOGS GRVA DPON SLOB RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SNGAGS GRVA 'DI NYID KYI DBU 'DZUG MKHAN GYI BYA BRAL BA LEGS PA'I MING CAN GYIS GSER 'PHYANG GI LO LA DBEN @047A *, ,GNAS SENGGE RJOD DU SBYAR BA'O,,) DGE'O,, KHYAB BDAG DPAL LDAN BLA MA DANG, ,GNYIS MI SPYOD RDO RJE DPAL, ,GSANG 'DZIN LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS, ,GUS PAS 'DUD DO DGE LEGS STZAL, ,RGYAL BSTAN RIN CHEN GSAL MDZAD PA'I, ,ZI NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN CAN GYIS, ,YI DAM GSANG BA 'DUS PA YI, ,BSKYED RIM MTHA' DPYOD GANG GSUNGS PA, ,GSANG SNGAGS 'CHAD NYAN RGYAS PHYIR DANG, ,CHOS SBYIN RNAM DAG SPEL BA'I PHYIR, ,MI PHYIR DAD LDAN AA MOR S'A NA YIS, ,LHAG BSAM DAG PAS DPAR DU BSKRUN, ,'DI'I MTHUS SH'AKYA'I BSTAN PA DANG, ,RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO YI, ,MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL BSTAN PA MCHOG ,PHYOGS BRGYAR RGYAS SHING GNAS PAR SHOG ,YON SBYOR GROGS BYED DO DAM PA, 'BRI BRKOS BYED PA MTHA' DAG GIS, ,DGE TSOGS GANG BSAGS MA LUS PA, ,ZUNG 'JUG THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, (CES MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MKHAS SHING GRUB 'KHOR LO BSGYUR PA CHEN PO, ^RJE ZI NA LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GSANG 'DUS BSKYED RIM GYI MTHA' DPYOD KYI DPAR GSANG DU BSKRUN PA'I SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG GIS LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ^SKYES MING BA LHA BTZUN BSTAN RIN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
